hypothesis_content.title: Volatility Compression Breakout Regime Shift
hypothesis_content.statement: When BTC 20-day realized volatility compresses below 30% while price consolidates within 5% of 20-day high, a breakout above consolidation high with volume >1.5x 20-day average will signal transition from NEUTRAL to BULL regime with 70% accuracy over next 5 days.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Extended low volatility at highs represents accumulation before directional move. Breakout with volume confirms institutional participation and regime change.
entry_conditions: BTC price within 5% of 20-day high for minimum 7 days
BTC breaks above consolidation high with >1.5x 20D avg volume

exit_conditions.take_profit: 5% gain from entry OR regime shifts to BULL (confidence > 70%)
exit_conditions.stop_loss: 3% loss from entry OR price returns below consolidation low
exit_conditions.time_exit: 5 trading days without regime shift confirmation

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: More than 30% of such breakouts fail to sustain BULL regime for >3 days OR result in immediate reversal to BEAR regime.
